events.constraint: find(service_provider_1.pincode = customer_new.pincode and service_provider_1.address2=customer_new.address2) show service_provider_1.name order by service_provider_1.last_order_time asc 10;
find(service_provider_1.pincode = customer_new.pincode and service_provider_1.address2=customer_new.address2) show service_provider_1.name order by service_provider_1.last_order_time asc 10;
find(service_provider_1.pincode = customer_new.pincode and service_provider_1.address2=customer_new.address2) show service_provider_1.name order by service_provider_1.last_order_time asc 10;
